name: Take Command - 2nd Manassas
description: Your quest for the true immersive Civil War battle experience ends here. Voted in PC Gamers list of Best 100 Games of All Time, Take Command is an RTCS "Real-Time Combat Simulator" and you've never played anything like it!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 98/ME/2000/XP/Win7/Win10 Processor: P3 1000 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 64MB Video Card (DX9 Compatible) Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP/Win7/Win10 Processor: P4 1.8 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB Video Card (DX9 Compatible)

reviews.review_text: this is a good game.The graphics are the best i have seen in years.The graphics are so realistic that i got PTSD from it.10/10-would play again(sarcasm)  jokes aside it is a good game.i will say that the ai is better than the ones in the total war series.The ai under your command are smart enough to make decisions for themselves and usually does not require you to babysit them,although if you want to micromanage you can.I dont have a good computer....actually a very very weak one.fortunately this game runs well.so if it can run for me,than most likely it will run for you.also windows 10. i am not a veteran in this game so obviously i am not sun tzu when i play this game.  Now the bad.i will say that i got confused with the ui  1st Antarctica(Pingu)Battalion,forward march!.
